page.title: 07Employment Chaldon Hills
page.content: Apart from the Army Camp (see Armed Forces) the principal source of employment for heads of households is local farms.They are employed as skilled specialist workers,such as dairymen,tractor drivers and shepherds. Other members of households travel outside the block to find employment. The main centres being the towns of Bournemouth,Poole and Dorchester, the Army Garrison at Bovington and the Atomic Energy Establishment on Winfrith Heath. During the summer some seasonal employment is available in the holiday trade centred on Lulworth Cove and Durdle Door. The only exception to this pattern is at Marley Wood Barn where the owner/ occupier,Mr.Wintrip, is a self-employed restorer of antiques with a workshop attached to his house.
